structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
URBAN SERVICES DISTRICTS -- AMBULANCE SERVICE DISTRICTS

text.section: An urban services district may be created in accordance with the procedures of KRS 65.810.
The Governor shall, immediately upon certification that the district has been established, appoint five (5) qualified persons as members of the council.

law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 12, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 240, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 20, sec. 6, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 123. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 3. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 150, secs. 5 and 6.
